events.name: Demand for new energy vehicles in the US market

events.name: CAFE regulations
events.wd_description: The Corporate Average Fuel Economy (CAFE) regulations will continue to drive demand for new energy vehicles in the US market.

events.name: low-cost batteries
events.wd_description: The development of low-cost batteries will improve the affordability of new energy vehicles, driving up demand.

events.name: improving infrastructure
